briefTitle: A Study Evaluating Bilastine Ophthalmic Solution 0.6% in the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (Ora-CAC®) Model.
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Double-Masked, Randomized, Vehicle- and Active-Controlled, Phase 3 Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Bilastine Ophthalmic Solution 0.6% Compared to Vehicle and Zaditen (Ketotifen Ophthalmic Solution 0.025%) for the Treatment of Allergic Conjunctivitis in the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (Ora-CAC®) Model
summary: To evaluate the efficacy of Bilastine ophthalmic solution 0.6% compared to vehicle and Zaditen (Ketotifen ophthalmic solution 0.025%) for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of allergic conjunctivitis.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: The outcome measure was assessed at Visit 4b (Day 1: 16h post-treatment) and Visit 5 (Day 8 ±3, 15 minutes post-treatment).
